Name: Esmeralda
Ingredients: 10 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Cachaça, lime and elderflower with a smoky hit of Islay whisky.
History: Adapted from a recipe originally created by Ben Sandrof at Drink, Boston, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Esmeralda contains 199 calories
